A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie ruined the adventure and image of Luke Skywalker.  There should have been a much better transition such as training together\, mentor ship\, fighting evil together\, Skywalker blood line revelation\, heros death\, and passing of torch.  Also\, the new characters are weak and unappealing\, no real emotional connection.  Unnatural and forced humor. They should shred this movie and redo it.  Quit trying to make political points.  This caused them to ruin one of the best stories and adventures of all time.
